description: This action returns recovery point ARNs (Amazon Resource Names) of the specified legal hold.

parameters.name: LegalHoldId
parameters.description: The ID of the legal hold.

nested_items.name: RecoveryPointArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the parent (composite) recovery point.

nested_items.name: ResourceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies a saved resource.

nested_items.name: ResourceType
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services resource type that is saved as a recovery point.

nested_items.name: BackupVaultName
nested_items.description: The name of the backup vault (the logical container in which backups are stored).

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The next item following a partial list of returned resources.
